query:
ALTER TABLE sessionPhotos 
ADD COLUMN moderationStatus VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'approved' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN flagCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN isHidden BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL;
